content: this cowl is worked end to end flat the ends are seamed together to form a tube the cowl can be worn wrapped once or twice around the neck **finished measurements** width 9½ length 45 **materials** premier® yarns anti-pilling everyday® worsted gradient 98% anti-pilling acrylic 2% metalized polyester 7oz/200g 360yds/330m 2115-12 sangria tones 1 ball hook us size i-9 5 5 mm hook or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle **gauge** 6 v-st x 8 row = 4
